definition[0]: the process of arranging and supplying a loan, especially a MORTGAGE (=loan for buying a house)
example[0]: the loan origination and funding functions of banks
definition[1]: the work involved in making something from the beginning through to the finished product
example[2]: How efficiently can our organization implement an idea from origination to commercialization?
example[3]: The group incurred heavyorigination costs in developing its video catalogue.
